data.eml:eml: Revision of the Agrilus quadripunctatus species-group (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Agrilini) with description of four new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jendek, Eduard (2018): Revision of the Agrilus quadripunctatus species-group (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Agrilini) with description of four new species. Zootaxa 4392 (2): 383-391, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4392.2.10
